verses.verse: Then I <S%H7200>looked<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> at <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6217>acts<s%> of <S%H6217>oppression<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were being <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun.<s%> And <S%H2009>behold<s%> [I saw] the <S%H1832>tears<s%> of the <S%H6231>oppressed<s%> and [that] they <S%H369>had<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> to <S%H5162>comfort<s%> [them;] and on the <S%H3027>side<s%> of their <S%H6231>oppressors<s%> was <S%H3581>power,<s%> but they <S%H369>had<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> to <S%H5162>comfort<s%> [them.]

So I <S%H9576>congratulated<s%> the <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H7945>who<s%> are <S%H3528>already<s%> <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are <S%H5728>still<s%> <S%H2416>living.<s%>

But <S%H2896>better<s%> [off] <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them is the one <S%H834>who<s%> has <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H1961>existed,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> has <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4639>activity<s%> that is <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>

And I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> that <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5999>labor<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3788>skill<s%> which is <S%H4639>done<s%> is [the result of] <S%H7068>rivalry<s%> between a <S%H376>man<s%> and his <S%H7453>neighbor.<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> <S%H1571>too<s%> is <S%H1892>vanity<s%> and <S%H7469>striving<s%> after <S%H7307>wind.<s%>

One <S%H3709>hand<s%> <S%H4393>full<s%> of <S%H5183>rest<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> two <S%H2651>fists<s%> <S%H4393>full<s%> of <S%H5999>labor<s%> and <S%H7469>striving<s%> after <S%H7307>wind.<s%>

<S%H3426>There<s%> was a <S%H259>certain<s%> <S%H259>man<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> a <S%H8145>dependent,<s%> <S%H369>having<s%> <S%H1571>neither<s%> <S%H369><s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H369>nor<s%> a <S%H251>brother,<s%> yet <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7093>end<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5999>labor.<s%> <S%H1571>Indeed,<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> were not <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H6239>riches<s%> [and he never asked,] "And for <S%H4310>whom<s%> am I <S%H6001>laboring<s%> and <S%H2637>depriving<s%> <S%H5315>myself<s%> of <S%H9186>pleasure<s%>?" <S%H2088>This<s%> <S%H1571>too<s%> is <S%H1892>vanity<s%> and it is a <S%H7451>grievous<s%> <S%H6045>task.<s%>

For <S%H518>if<s%> either of them <S%H5307>falls,<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> will <S%H6965>lift<s%> up his <S%H2270>companion.<s%> But <S%H337>woe<s%> to the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7945>who<s%> <S%H5307>falls<s%> when <S%H369>there<s%> is not <S%H8145>another<s%> to <S%H6965>lift<s%> him up.

And <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> can <S%H8630>overpower<s%> him <S%H259>who<s%> is alone, <S%H8147>two<s%> can <S%H5975>resist<s%> <S%H5048><s%> him. A <S%H2339>cord<s%> of <S%H8027>three<s%> [strands] is not <S%H4120>quickly<s%> <S%H5423>torn<s%> <S%H5423>apart.<s%>

A <S%H4542>poor,<s%> yet <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H3206>lad<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> an <S%H2205>old<s%> and <S%H3684>foolish<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> [how] to <S%H2094>receive<s%> <S%H2094>instruction.<s%>

For he has <S%H3318>come<s%> out of <S%H1004>prison<s%> <S%H631><s%> to <S%H4427>become<s%> <S%H4427>king,<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> he was <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H7326>poor<s%> in his <S%H4438>kingdom.<s%>

I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H1980>throng<s%> to the <S%H5973>side<s%> of the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3206>lad<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5975>replaces<s%> <S%H8478><s%> him.

<S%H369>There<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7093>end<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were <S%H6440>before<s%> them, and <S%H1571>even<s%> the <S%H314>ones<s%> <S%H314>who<s%> will <S%H314>come<s%> <S%H314>later<s%> will not be <S%H8055>happy<s%> with him, for <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1571>too<s%> is <S%H1892>vanity<s%> and <S%H7475>striving<s%> after <S%H7307>wind.<s%>
